explains: v. 传送，运输；表达，传递；<法律>转让（土地、财产等）

sentences.en: Euclid was trying to convey his idea of a geometrical point.
sentences.cn: 欧几里德正试图表达他的一个几何学观点。

sentences.en: I have tried to convey something of the flavour of the argument.
sentences.cn: 我试图表达某种类似论据的东西。

sentences.en: Please convey my gratitude to her.
